title: Ticket #4219: Work Fetch Test Never Worked
description: Upon a need to test work fetch on pslots too, I noticed the current test which says it passed could never have worked. A new single test was created without requiring but one file plus the work fetch scripts. The old test and all the pieces were deleted. A variation of this new test now gives us a basic test for pslots besides static slots. The workfetch job itself is now a script which allows better tracking of what is happening.
check_ins:
2014-Feb-19 12:41   Check-in [39441]: Created a repaired GSI test good for ten years via certs and proxy and turned it back on. #4221 Created new working static slot work fetch test and adapted to windows using new wrappers. Then used this test as a basis for a pslot work fetch test(Linux only till a windows issue is corrected. #4219 (By Bill Taylor )
2014-Feb-19 12:07   Check-in [39439]: This old test for work fetch said it passed when it could have never passed. #4219 (By Bill Taylor )
creator: bt
